select dic.id as id, dic.dic_code as dicCode, dic.dic_content as dicContent, dic.sort as sort, dic.pid as pid, dic2.dic_content as pidContent, dic.enabled as enabled, dic.create_user_id as createUserId, dic.del_flag as delFlag from sys_data_dic dic left join (select id,dic_code,dic_content ,pid from sys_data_dic) dic2 on dic.pid=dic2.dic_code where dic.pid=#{dataDicCo.pid} and dic.del_flag='N'
and dic.dic_content like CONCAT('%',#{dataDicCo.keyword},'%')
order by dic.sort
SELECT sdd.dic_code, sdd.dic_content FROM sys_data_dic sdd WHERE sdd.pid = #{code} and sdd.del_flag='N'

SELECT p.id, p.dic_code, p.dic_content, p.sort, p.enabled, p.del_flag, c.id as childId, c.dic_code as childCode, c.dic_content as childDicContent, c.sort as childSort, c.enabled as childEnabled, c.del_flag as childDelFlag from sys_data_dic p join sys_data_dic c on p.dic_code=c.pid where p.pid='DIC_ROOT' and p.dic_code != 'DIC_ROOT' and p.del_flag='N' and c.del_flag='N' order by p.sort asc,c.sort asc
